title: Balls
description: What's the one thing a footballer will do when he retires? He will look into the possibility of moving into football management, but for Jamie Spank, his next career move isn't going to be as easy as that. Clapham Wanderers need a new manager, Clapham Wanderers are a top London club struggling to survive in their division â€“ Clapham Wanderers are a female only football team.Jamie Spank believes he has the knowledge and skills to run any football club in the world, but what he doesn't expect to find is a changing room full of strong minded women, ready to put his dribbling skills to the ultimate test.An adult comedy, where what goes on in the female mind, definitely won't be staying in the dressing room any time soon!
author: Jimmy Tudeski
